data.text: Setare tinxinxi fan xaxilitare wule falɛ bɛ.
Gbatafe ra i mu naxan kolon, a mixi ratantanma nɛ.
Adamadi a yɛtɛ xun nakanama nɛ a xa daxuɲa ra,
Bannaya a niyama nɛ mixi xa boore gbegbe sɔtɔ,
Tɔɔɲɛgɛti fama nɛ ɲaxankatɛ sɔtɔde,
Mixi gbegbe katama e yɛtɛ rafande kinikinintee ma,
Setare mu rafan a ngaxakerenyie yati ma,
Mixi naxan xaxili fenma, a fe fanyi rabama nɛ a yɛtɛ bɛ.
Tɔɔɲɛgɛti fama nɛ ɲaxankatɛ sɔtɔde,
Naafuli mu lan xaxilitare yi ra,
Lɔnnila bɔɲɛ te xɔnɔ, a mu konbi ragbilenma.
Mangɛ xa xɔnɛ maniya yɛtɛ xaaɲɛ ra,
Di xaxilitare kɔntɔfili nan bɛndunma a baba ma,
Mixi banxi nun harige sɔtɔma e baba kɛ ra,
Tunnaxɔnɛ mixi luma nɛ xixɔli kui,
Mixi naxan Ala xa sɛriyɛ rabatuma,
Setare kife na maniyaxi Alatala donife nan na.
I xa fe birin naba i xa di xurufe ra alako a xa kisi,
Mixi naxan luma xɔnɔ ra, a na sare fima nɛ.
I xa i tuli mati marasi ra, i xa tin e xa i xaran,
Maɲɔxun gbegbe na mixi bɔɲɛ kui,
Adamadi wama a boore xa dugutɛgɛɲa a ma.
Alatala xa yaragaaxui mixi rakisima nɛ.
Tunnaxɔnɛ a donse tongoma nɛ a bɛlɛxɛ,
Mixi mayele bɔnbɔ, alako xaxilitare xa xaxili sɔtɔ.
Di naxan a baba kasarama, a a nga keri,
N ma di, xa i mu marasi ramɛma,
Seede wule falɛ yoma sɛriyɛ nan ma,
Mixi mayele ɲaxankatama nɛ,
